packages.title: Budget Starter
packages.description: Perfect for basic needs like lights, fans, TV, and charging gadgets. A great first step into solar.

packages.title: Home Essential
packages.description: Runs all the essentials plus a small fridge. Ideal for small families wanting significant relief from NEPA.

packages.description: Powers a whole household, including a freezer and maybe a small AC unit. True energy independence.

packages.title: Office Pro
packages.description: Designed for small to medium businesses to keep operations running smoothly without generator noise and costs.
